titleInfo.title: Cedar Hill & Company Orchard Company receipt, Winchester, Tennessee, circa 1900

mods.identifier: Arcade Music Coll - receipts & invoices C 002

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: A receipt circa 1900 issued to John Sadler of Hughes, Tennessee for part payment for a bill of nursery stock from the Cedar Hill & Company Orchard Company, Winchester, Tennessee. It is signed by J.W. Shadow, Manager and A.A. Byrnes, Salesman. Forms part of the Arcade Music Collection. 1 document.
mods.accessCondition: U.S. and international copyright laws protect this digital content, which is provided for educational purposes only and may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed for any other purpose without written permission. subject.topic: Cedar Hill and Company Orchard Company (Winchester, Tenn.)
